headline: Where Congress’s Cuts Threaten Access to PBS and NPR

headline: Trump Insists the Epstein Case Is a Hoax. Here’s What His Supporters Say.

description: Their actions range from pressuring the administration to release more information to spinning additional conspiracy theories about the case of Jeffrey Epstein, the convicted sex offender.

headline: There’s a Flash Flood Season, and This Is It

description: July’s hot temperatures and moist air are the perfect ingredients for rain.

headline: The White House’s plan to downsize the federal government, in charts
description: An agency-by-agency look at how President Donald Trump and his advisors plan to dramatically shrink the federal government.

headline: Emmy nominations 2025: See our updating list of the best in TV
description: See what surprises and snubs the 2025 Emmy nominations have in store this year.

headline: Who’ll be in Trump’s hero garden? There are a few surprises.
description: Trump’s 2021 executive order named 244 people to include in a garden of American heroes, and $40 million was allotted this month to build it.

headline: Camp Mystic’s leader got a ‘life threatening’ flood alert. They evacuated an hour later.
description: More than an hour passed between Camp Mystic receiving a severe flood warning and a decision to evacuate young campers asleep in cabins by the Guadalupe River.

headline: These are the most and least polluted national parks in the U.S.
description: While haze levels have declined in most national parks, more intense wildfires threaten to reverse this trend. See where your favorite park stands.

headline: Sean Duffy and six others with multiple jobs in Trump’s administration
description: Trump’s vow to shrink the federal government appears to rely, at least in part, on top officials doing multiples jobs. These seven are doing double, triple or quadruple duty.

headline: Kerr County did not use its most far-reaching alert system in deadly Texas floods
description: Local officials used the system more than two days after the recorded height of the floods.

description: Unregulated activity led by Chinese enterprises in conflict-ravaged Myanmar is creating an environmental calamity in neighboring Thailand.

label: https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/
description: An analysis of flood maps shows that several buildings, including those where children were sleeping, were in known hazard zones. A $5 million expansion in 2019 did nothing to alleviate the problem.
